title: In the Wake of the Bounty

sources.title: Charles Chauvel's "IN THE WAKE OF THE BOUNTY" 1933
sources.description: Very first adaptation of the Bounty adventure. Very first acting effort for futur star Errol Flynn too, just before making his decisive move from his native Australia to promissing Hollywood California. more info on http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0001224/

sources.title: In the Wake of the Bounty (1933) ERROL FLYNN
sources.description:
Stars: Errol Flynn, Arthur Greenaway, Mayne Lynton
Writer/Director: Charles Chauvel

Errol Flynn made his screen debut as Fletcher Christian in this Australian feature which blends drama with documentary as it explores the infamous story of the H.M.S. Bounty! The documentary footage visits Pitcairn Island, the actual island where Christian and his men took shelter and visits with several islanders descendants of the Bounty's crew.

metadata.Plot: A former member of the crew of the HMS Bounty recounts the story of the mutiny aboard ship. The Clauvel's, then, take a look at current day (1932) Tahiti and Pitcairn island. In turn, visiting the descendants of the ship's crew and studying their way of life. Including a search for the wreak of the ship. Stars Errol Flynn in his first movie. And directed by and narrated by Australian Charles Chauvel.
metadata.Actors: Arthur Greenaway, Mayne Lynton, Errol Flynn
